articles.author: Richard Pollina
articles.title: Paula Abdul sues 'American Idol' executive Nigel Lythgoe for alleged sexual assault - New York Post
articles.description: “Lythgoe knew and was aware that his treatment of Abdul was inappropriate and even criminal,” the suit states.
articles.content: Paula Abdul accused former American Idol and So You Think You Can Dance producer Nigel Lythgoe of allegedly sexually assaulting her multiple times, according to a lawsuit filed Friday in Los Angeles.… [+4488 chars]
